column1: In  view  of  the  above  reasons,  I  hold  that  the  Petitioners  have  failed  to  satisfy  a
potentially arguable claim such as unlawfulness, unfairness, or unreasonableness,
which warrants this Court to issue formal notices on the Respondents. Accordingly,
I refuse to issue formal notice and dismiss this application without cost.
Judge of the Court of Appeal
Judge of the Court of Appeal
